1.3 Exceptions and Special Circumstances of Information Collection and Use 1.3.1 Exceptions According to relevant laws, regulations and national standards, we or the third-party platforms we cooperate with may collect and use your relevant personal information without seeking your authorization and consent under the following circumstances:
1) Those directly related to national security, national defense security and other national interests, and those directly related to major public interests such as public safety, public health and public knowledge; 2) Those directly related to criminal investigation, prosecution, trial and execution of judgment; 3) To protect your or other individuals' life, property, reputation and other major legal rights and interests, but it is difficult to get the consent of the person:
4) The collected personal information is disclosed to the public by yourself;
5) Collect personal information from legally publicly disclosed information, such as legal news reports, government information disclosure and other channels. 6) It is necessary to sign and perform the contract according to your requirements;
7) Necessary to maintain the safe and stable operation of the products or services provided, such as finding and handling faults of the products or services; 8) When it is necessary to carry out statistical or academic research in the public interest and provide the results of academic research or description, the personal information contained in the results is de-identified; 9) other circumstances stipulated by laws and regulations.
1.32 Under special circumstances, please understand that the functions and services provided by us and the third-party platforms we cooperate with are constantly updated and developed. If a function or service provided by us needs to obtain new rights but is not listed in the above description, we will separately prompt you to choose whether to authorize or not through popup in the APP. Update and explain in the APP privacy policy; If a function or service provided by a third-party platform needs to obtain your new rights, the third-party platform may update and explain in its privacy policy. If you want to know the latest information about the third-party platform obtaining your rights, you can query the latest privacy policy of the third-party platform. 2.1. Cookies or similar technologies are commonly used on the Internet. When you experience, log in to or use our APP, we or the third party platforms we cooperate with may use relevant technologies to send a Cookie or a slaughtername identifier to your device. To collect and store information about your visits and use of this APP, and to analyze your preference for using our APP. To optimize the user experience. We undertake that we will not use cookies for any purpose other than the purpose set forth in this Privacy Policy. 2.2 When using cookies or similar technologies, we will strictly abide by laws and regulations related to mobile Internet application security, and provide effective security measures to protect your personal information. If you want to know in detail how the third-party platforms we cooperate with use cookies or similar technologies, you can refer to the privacy policy of the third-party platforms.

How to Store Your Personal Information 4.1. We store your personal information only for the period necessary for the purposes stated in this Privacy Policy and for the shortest time required by laws and regulations. If we terminate our services or operations, we and the third-party platforms we cooperate with will promptly stop the activities of continuing to collect your personal information, notify you in advance in accordance with relevant laws and regulations, and delete or anonymize your personal information after the termination of the services or operations, unless otherwise stipulated by laws, regulations or regulatory authorities.
4.2. Personal information collected and generated by our operations within the territory of the People's Republic of China shall be stored within the territory of the People's Republic of China, except under the following circumstances:
1) Laws and regulations have clear provisions;
2) Obtain your authorization and consent;
3) At present, we will not transmit the above information abroad. If we do, we will comply with relevant national regulations or seek your consent
4) In view of the above circumstances, we will ensure adequate protection of your personal information in accordance with this Privacy Policy and the requirements of national laws and regulations
How to protect Your Personal Information 5.1. We will adopt a strict security system as well as industry-accepted security technologies and procedures to ensure that your personal information is not lost, disclosed, damaged or abused. 5.2 Our services shall encrypt and store your personal information by reasonable means such as encryption technology and anonymization, which are at the level required by the industry, and isolate your personal information by isolation technology. We will also adopt strict data access control and multiple identity authentication technology to protect personal information and prevent data from being misused. 5.3. We strengthen employees' security awareness and understanding of the importance of information protection by establishing data security management norms and adopting strict data access control. Failure to fulfill these obligations may result in legal liability or suspension of cooperation with us.
5.5 We will take all reasonably practicable measures to ensure that we do not collect personal information unrelated to our APP services. We will try our best to protect your personal information security. When your personal information is exposed, In case of damage or hand safety benefits, our control law requires me to inform you in a timely manner: the basic situation and possible impact of the safety incident, the disposal measures we have taken or will take, the suggestions that you can independently prevent and reduce risks, and the remedial measures for you, etc. At the same time, we will timely inform you of relevant information by E-mail, letter, telephone, push notification and other means. When it is difficult to inform the subject of information one by one, we will take a reasonable and effective way to release announcements. At the same time, we will also take the initiative to report the external situation of information security in accordance with the requirements of regulatory authorities. 5.7. When you obtain the virtual products related to our APP through payment, you will transact through the third-party payment service provider. At that time, you will inevitably disclose your information, such as contact information, bank account or email address, to the counterparty or potential counterparty. Please properly protect your own information and provide it to others only when necessary. 5.8 If we detect that you are using our APP, services and related information for fraudulent or illegal purposes, we will take corresponding measures, including but not limited to suspending or terminating your use of our APP or services.
